alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 09 at 5:36AM AKDT until October 10 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches Monday evening through Tuesday morning. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility will be over Steese Highway Summits.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
